title: Log In Issues
body:
I cannot log into League of Legends, It doesn't say anything about me being offline. **The client will not allow me to click Sign In and I removed the Patch lock already and the patch lock shows null.** Help?
Information: The Sign In button is gray["Blocked"]
-The Client does not say I am offline
-Removed the Patch-Lock already.

replies.body: I'd like to help out but I need some more info to do that.  Are you getting any error messages at all?  When you say the sign in is gray, do you mean on the patcher or the login screen?  Would you happy to have a screenshot handy?
I have fixed the problem, The sign in is gray was in the login screen. I had a screen shot but dont know how to send it for it will not let me.
actually i just fixed it, delete the entire "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" file and reopen the client...and tada
having the same issue, and did the same things, as well as a full repair didnt help any
